latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service observed at time of inspection to be providing care for infants under 12 months of age in groups mixed with older children
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection toxic substances observed improperly stored so as to result in the potential for exposure or contamination of facility surfaces
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection required hand wash signs were not provided
At time of inspection it was determined/observed that food service worker not provided with appropriate food thermometer during food prep
